timeline.author: rongrong
rongrong
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -33,6 +34,7 @@ public void testDefaults()
         assertRecordedDefaults(ConfigAssertions.recordDefaults(DbResourceGroupConfig.class)
                 .setConfigDbUrl(null)
                 .setMaxRefreshInterval(new Duration(1, HOURS))
+                .setReloadRefreshInterval(new Duration(1, SECONDS))

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/presto-resource-group-managers/src/test/java/com/facebook/presto/resourceGroups/db/TestDbResourceGroupConfig.java b/presto-resource-group-managers/src/test/java/com/facebook/presto/resourceGroups/db/TestDbResourceGroupConfig.java
index a6d170d9c3..f1defa2320 100644
--- a/presto-resource-group-managers/src/test/java/com/facebook/presto/resourceGroups/db/TestDbResourceGroupConfig.java
+++ b/presto-resource-group-managers/src/test/java/com/facebook/presto/resourceGroups/db/TestDbResourceGroupConfig.java

@@ -34,7 +33,6 @@ public class TestDbResourceGroupConfig
         assertRecordedDefaults(ConfigAssertions.recordDefaults(DbResourceGroupConfig.class)
                 .setConfigDbUrl(null)
                 .setMaxRefreshInterval(new Duration(1, HOURS))
-                .setReloadRefreshInterval(new Duration(1, SECONDS))
                 .setExactMatchSelectorEnabled(false));
     }
